import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { FaExclamationTriangle, FaChartLine, FaGraduationCap, FaShieldAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { const fadeInUp = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: 60 }, animate: { opacity: 1, y: 0 }, transition: { duration: 0.6 } }; const staggerContainer = { animate: { transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
Critical Warning

The Harsh Reality of Trading Markets

Evidence-based insights into why 99% of retail traders fail and how to avoid becoming another statistic

99% Failure Rate
80% Lose Money
6.5% Annual Underperformance
View Statistics Read Research
{/* Key Points Section */}
Why Most Traders Fail

Poor Risk Management

Most traders don't use proper stop-loss orders, over-leverage their positions, and fail to diversify their portfolios, leading to catastrophic losses.

Emotional Decision Making

Fear, greed, and overconfidence drive trading decisions instead of rational analysis, causing traders to buy high, sell low, and chase losses.

Lack of Education

Insufficient understanding of market mechanics, technical analysis, and fundamental factors leads to poor trading decisions and consistent losses.

Systemic Disadvantages

Retail traders face unfair competition from institutional investors with better tools, information, and resources, making success nearly impossible.

{/* Warning Section */}

Critical Warning

Trading is not a path to quick wealth. The overwhelming majority of retail traders lose money consistently. Studies show that between 70-80% of day traders lose money in the long run, with many experiencing significant financial and emotional damage.

Before you consider trading, understand that you're competing against:

  • Professional traders with advanced algorithms and real-time data
  • Institutional investors with billions in capital
  • High-frequency trading firms that execute trades in milliseconds
  • Market makers who control liquidity and pricing

The odds are fundamentally stacked against you.

{/* Call to Action */}

Make Informed Decisions

Don't become another trading statistic. Educate yourself about the realities of trading markets and explore safer alternatives for building wealth.

Explore Alternatives Learn More
); }; export default Home;
